3.95
Disqualification 
1. If one of the spouses is unable to administer the common property or administers it at a loss, the other spouse may apply to the court for the first spouse to be excluded from the administration of the property. The court shall grant such an application if the applicant proves that it is necessary for the needs of the family or of the joint business of the spouses. 
2. A spouse who has been excluded by the court from the management of the property may, after the circumstances which led to his or her exclusion have ceased to exist, apply to the court to be allowed to manage the joint property again.
